synopsis.text: Work of a graduate student from Tokyo University of the Arts, Satomi Maiya, unfolds a poignant tale in the Department of Animation. A young girl, driven by suspicion, trails her mother after witnessing her secretly discard a heartfelt letter into the icy ocean. With her emotions unacknowledged, the girl finds herself aboard a rowboat, awaiting the thaw in a frozen sea and the revelation of her mother's mysterious actions.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
